home.title: CineQo
home.subtitle: Professional Micro-Drama Creation Tool
home.slogan: Make creation easier, make stories better
home.description: From script to final cut, an all-in-one micro-drama creation platform. AI-assisted creation to help content creators efficiently produce high-quality micro-drama works.

hero.title: Professional Micro-Drama
hero.subtitle: From script to final cut, an all-in-one micro-drama creation platform

features.title: Powerful Creation Features
features.subtitle: Complete micro-drama creation toolchain to empower your creative journey

script.title: AI Script Writing
script.description: Intelligent script generation and editing with episode management. AI-assisted dialogue creation for more vivid stories.

storyboard.title: Storyboard Design
storyboard.description: Visual storyboard editor for precise shot control. Support for professional settings like shot types and camera movements.

character.title: Character Management
character.description: Unified character management with attributes, relationships, and arcs. Ensure consistency in character portrayal.

scene.title: Scene Management
scene.description: Scene library management and reuse with descriptions and prop lists. Make every scene unique.

ai.title: AI Video Production
ai.description: AI-powered automated video production workflow. Generate videos from text with one click. Dramatically improve creation efficiency.

edit.title: Smart Editing
edit.description: Intelligent video editing tools with quick color grading, transitions, and effects. Give your work a professional touch.

step1.description: Create amazing scripts with AI assistance

step2.description: Design character images and scene atmosphere

step3.description: Plan every shot and camera movement

cta.title: Start Creating Your Micro-Drama
cta.description: Join CineQo and experience professional creation tools that bring your stories to life
